newsitem.title: USA: Starcraft sees $700,000 Q1 pretax charge.
newsitem.headline: Starcraft sees $700,000 Q1 pretax charge.

text.p: Starcraft Corp, a manufacturer of van and truck conversions, said it estimates it will take a $700,000 pretax restructuring charge in the first quarter of fiscal 1997.
The company's first fiscal quarter ends December 29.
The company plans to consolidate its Imperial manufacturing operations into Starcraft's Goshen, Ind. manufacturing complex in December 1996.
